Standard: This is a MENTALLICA poster
RU: Это плакат МЕНТАЛИКИ.
ENG: This is a MENTALLICA poster

Standard: What a terrifying poster! I better take it down.
RU: Какой кошмарный плакат! Надо его сорвать.
ENG: What a terrifying poster! I better take it down.

Standard: This is a MENTALLICA audiotape.
RU: Это кассета с МЕНТАЛИКОЙ.
ENG: This is a MENTALLICA audiotape.

Standard: Sure does look satanic! It is definitely dangerous!
RU: Такая музыка играет в Аду! Эта кассета опасна!
ENG: Sure does look satanic! It is definitely dangerous!

Standard: This is a "rulebook" for a board game Dungeons and Demons!
RU: Это “книга правил” для настольной игры Подземелья и Демоны!
ENG: This is a "rulebook" for a board game Dungeons and Demons!

Standard: If this isn't an indoctrination book, I don't know what is!
RU: Однозначно, это книга для промывания мозгов!
ENG: If this isn't an indoctrination book, I don't know what is!

Standard: I think that's all of them! I should just burn it in the furnace, in the garage.
RU: Думаю, это всё! Надо отправить это в печь, что в гараже.
ENG: I think that's all of them! I should just burn it in the furnace, in the garage.

Standard: Now, there {$items} more satanic objects to find!
RU: Осталось найти еще {$items}.
ENG: Now, there {$items} more satanic objects to find!

Standard: I don't need to go there right now!
RU: Мне туда сейчас не нужно!
ENG: I don't need to go there right now!

Standard: I am afraid to go outside! What if there are demons there?
RU: Мне страшно выходить наружу! Вдруг там демоны с монстрами?
ENG: I am afraid to go outside! What if there are demons there?

Standard: I don't really need to go to the bathroom.
RU: Я не хочу в туалет.
ENG: I don't really need to go to the bathroom.

Standard: I should go look for these demonic items in my son's bedroom!
RU: Я должна поискать дьявольские вещи в спальне моего сына!
ENG: I should go look for these demonic items in my son's bedroom!

Standard: Burn, burn, burn! There is no place for Satan in my home!
RU: Гори, гори ясно! Дьяволу нет места в моем доме!
ENG: Burn, burn, burn! There is no place for Satan in my home!

Standard: Now that the job is done, I can finally rest near the TV again. Another day done right!
RU: Дело сделано, можно и прилечь у телевизора. Очередной день проведен с пользой!
ENG: Now that the job is done, I can finally rest near the TV again. Another day done right!

Standard: Karen: This does raise a concern! I think I saw something that could be satanic in my son's room upstairs...
RU: Карен: Ну ничего себе! Мне кажется, я видела что-то сатанистическое в комнате моего сына.
ENG: Karen: This does raise a concern! I think I saw something that could be satanic in my son's room upstairs...

Standard: I have to investigate immediately!
RU: Я должна срочно проверить второй этаж!
ENG: I have to investigate immediately!

Standard: TV: In today's news: there was an event of greatest importance today! Jonathan Wozzus gave us his inaugural speech, in which he....
RU: ТВ: В сегодняшних новостях: сегодня случилось величайшее событие! Джонатан Возусс выступил с инаугурационной речью, в которой он...
ENG: TV: In today's news: there was an event of greatest importance today! Jonathan Wozzus gave us his inaugural speech, in which he....

Standard: LADIES AND GENTLEMEN, WELCOME!
RU: ЛЕДИ И ДЖЕНТЛЬМЕНЫ, ДОБРО ПОЖАЛОВАТЬ!!
ENG: LADIES AND GENTLEMEN, WELCOME!

Standard: MY NAME IS SETH, AND TODAY'S PUBLIC SERVICE ANNOUNCEMENT IS DEDICATED TO: YOUR FEARS!
RU: МЕНЯ ЗОВУТ СЕТ, И В СЕГОДНЯШНЕЙ ПЕРЕДАЧЕ МЫ ПОГОВОРИМ О: ВАШИХ СТРАХАХ!
ENG: MY NAME IS SETH, AND TODAY'S PUBLIC SERVICE ANNOUNCEMENT IS DEDICATED TO: YOUR FEARS!

Standard: THIS PROGRAM IS BROUGHT TO YOU BY THE SALVATION PROJECT.
RU: ГЛАВНЫЙ СПОНСОР НАШЕЙ ПРОГРАММЫ - ПРОЖЕКТ ИСКУПЛЕНИЯ
ENG: THIS PROGRAM IS BROUGHT TO YOU BY THE SALVATION PROJECT.

Standard: And what fear are we going to be discussing today?
RU: И о каких же страхах мы будем говорить?
ENG: And what fear are we going to be discussing today?

Standard: Spiders
RU: Пауки
ENG: Spiders

Standard: The Nuclear War
RU: Ядерная война
ENG: The Nuclear War

Standard: Satanism
RU: Сатанизм
ENG: Satanism

Standard: THAT'S RIGHT!
RU: ПРАВИЛЬНО!
ENG: THAT'S RIGHT!

Standard: SATANISM!
RU: САТАНИЗМ!
ENG: SATANISM!

Standard: Satanism is a great danger to our citizens, and we aaaall should be on our toes!
RU: Итак, сатанизм представляет огромную опасность для наших граждан, потому мы все должны быть начеку!
ENG: Satanism is a great danger to our citizens, and we aaaall should be on our toes!

Standard: It's a danger to our souls, to our world, and OUR way of living!
RU: Наш мир, наш образ жизни, наши ДУШИ находятся в опасности!
ENG: It's a danger to our souls, to our world, and OUR way of living!

Standard: And this Danger strikes where it hurts most - our children!
RU: А главную опасность берут на себя наши дети!
ENG: And this Danger strikes where it hurts most - our children!

Standard: To make sure your kids are safe, you should locate the satanic objects in your household before it's too late!
RU: Чтобы уберечь ваших детей, необходимо избавиться от дьявольских вещей внутри вашего дома!
ENG: To make sure your kids are safe, you should locate the satanic objects in your household before it's too late!

Standard: The typical satanic objects include: satanic audiotapes, satanic posters, or satanic books.
RU: Дьявольские кассеты, дьявольские постеры, дьявольские книги, всё это - типичные вещи Дьявола.
ENG: The typical satanic objects include: satanic audiotapes, satanic posters, or satanic books.

Standard: Beware, these can be hidden in plain sight!
RU: Будьте внимательны, они могут быть скрыты на самом видном месте.
ENG: Beware, these can be hidden in plain sight!

Standard: And on that, we wish your family luck, in searching and destroying the threats inside your home!
RU: На этой ноте мы желаем вашей семье удачи в поиске и устранении угроз в вашем доме.
ENG: And on that, we wish your family luck, in searching and destroying the threats inside your home!

Standard: Be careful, because if you don't care, THEY WILL.
RU: Берегите себя и своих близких, иначе беречь будет нечего!
ENG: Be careful, because if you don't care, THEY WILL.

Standard: This has been a broadcast from the Salvation Project. Until next time!\nSeth out!
RU: Это был эфир Прожекта Искупления, с вами был Сет.\nДо скорой встречи!
ENG: This has been a broadcast from the Salvation Project. Until next time!\nSeth out!

Standard: Karen: Oh no! I think the power went out because of the overload!
RU: Карен: О нет! Кажется, пробки выбило из-за нагрузки!
ENG: Karen: Oh no! I think the power went out because of the overload!

Standard: I should go down to the garage and restart the power.
RU: Я должна спуститься в гараж и включить свет.
ENG: I should go down to the garage and restart the power.

Standard: The power is on, everything is ok.
RU: Свет работает, всё хорошо.
ENG: The power is on, everything is ok.

Standard: I think I almost died! It was so dark! And something definitely was in here!
RU: Мне кажется, я чуть не померла! Было так темно и там точно что-то было!
ENG: I think I almost died! It was so dark! And something definitely was in here!

Standard: Good thing I managed to bring the light back to my house!
RU: Хорошо, что я смогла включить свет в доме!
ENG: Good thing I managed to bring the light back to my house!

Standard: I should go and rest...
RU: Мне нужно прилечь...
ENG: I should go and rest...

Standard: And, you have correctly identified, that Satan is the root of all problems!
RU: И, как вы правильно определили, Дьявол - корень всех проблем!
ENG: And, you have correctly identified, that Satan is the root of all problems!

Standard: Even if you are afraid of the Nuclear War, it's not imminent, and does not rely on your participation. However this problem does!
RU: Даже если вы боитесь ядерной войны, она случится еще не скоро, и вам её не остановить. А вот эту проблему предотвратить можно!
ENG: Even if you are afraid of the Nuclear War, it's not imminent, and does not rely on your participation. However this problem does!

Standard: Satan is very much real, and is nearing your home! Perhaps you noticed the signs already!
RU: Дьявол очень даже реален, и он приближается к вашему дому! Возможно вы даже заметили некоторые предпосылки…
ENG: Satan is very much real, and is nearing your home! Perhaps you noticed the signs already!

Standard: The lights, your son's behaviour... And however more that you don't notice!  And I am here, to help you with the protection of your home!
RU: Проблемы со светом, поведение вашего сына… И еще многое, на что вы не обращаете внимание! Поэтому я здесь, чтобы помочь защитить ваш дом!
ENG: The lights, your son's behaviour... And however more that you don't notice!  And I am here, to help you with the protection of your home!

Standard: Karen: Okay.... But why me? Isn't everyone in danger? Why help me in particular?
RU: Карен: Хорошо… Но почему я? Разве не все в опасности? Почему ты помогаешь именно мне?
ENG: Karen: Okay.... But why me? Isn't everyone in danger? Why help me in particular?

Standard: Seth: Silly, I AM helping everyone!
RU: Сет: Да ну вы что, я И ТАК помогаю всем!
ENG: Seth: Silly, I AM helping everyone!

Standard: I have already helped countless people, and you are just another lucky child of God, who gets the special treatment!
RU: Я помог куче людей, а вы лишь ещё божье одно дитя, которому я помогаю!
ENG: I have already helped countless people, and you are just another lucky child of God, who gets the special treatment!

Standard: But hush now, it was hard for your nerves today already!
RU: Тише, дитя. Сегодня был тяжелый день.
ENG: But hush now, it was hard for your nerves today already!

Standard: Go to sleep now, I will guard it with my life! After you wake up, there is much to be done!
RU: Ложись спать, я удостоверюсь, чтобы тебя никто не потревожил, даже если это будет стоить мне жизни! Завтра нам предстоит много дел!
ENG: Go to sleep now, I will guard it with my life! After you wake up, there is much to be done!

Standard: Even if you are afraid of spiders, now you know there are things that are much worse than that!
RU: Даже если вы боитесь пауков, теперь вы знаете, что есть вещи и пострашнее!
ENG: Even if you are afraid of spiders, now you know there are things that are much worse than that!

Standard: Well hello there missus!
RU: Ну здравствуйте, мисс!
ENG: Well hello there missus!

Standard: I believe you find yourself in a bit of a situation!
RU: Я так наблюдаю, вы оказались в не самом приятном положении!
ENG: I believe you find yourself in a bit of a situation!

Standard: Karen: Wha.....
RU: Карен: Какого…
ENG: Karen: Wha.....

Standard: Why are you here? How did you get inside?
RU: Почему ты здесь? Как ты сюда попал?
ENG: Why are you here? How did you get inside?

Standard: Seth: Why? Missus, this is an emergency! And a big one I might say!
RU: Сет: Почему? Мисс, это необычная ситуация! И довольно опасная!
ENG: Seth: Why? Missus, this is an emergency! And a big one I might say!

Standard: I came here, to help you get rid of the demons in your home! I see you've been watching my programs, and following them!
RU: Я пришел сюда, чтобы помочь вам избавиться от демонов в вашем доме! Вижу, вы смотрели мои передачи и следовали им!
ENG: I came here, to help you get rid of the demons in your home! I see you've been watching my programs, and following them!

Standard: Karen: Oh no! It's almost 8 p.m.! I should do something, before it's too late!
RU: Карен: О нет! Сейчас почти 8 вечера! Нужно что-то сделать, пока не поздно!
ENG: Karen: Oh no! It's almost 8 p.m.! I should do something, before it's too late!

Standard: I have to turn on the lights in the places where we sleep, so the Devil does not invade us when we are not awake!
RU: Я должна включить свет в местах сна, чтобы Дьявол не напал пока мы спим!
ENG: I have to turn on the lights in the places where we sleep, so the Devil does not invade us when we are not awake!

Standard: But the corridors are equally important, so I should probably light them too!
RU: Коридоры не менее важны, там тоже стоит включить свет!
ENG: But the corridors are equally important, so I should probably light them too!

Standard: LADIES AND GENTLEMEN, WELCOME!
RU: ЛЕДИ И ДЖЕНТЛЬМЕНЫ, ДОБРО ПОЖАЛОВАТЬ!!
ENG: LADIES AND GENTLEMEN, WELCOME!

Standard: My name is Seth, and today's Public Service Announcement is dedicated to — Energy Consumption!
RU: МЕНЯ ЗОВУТ СЕТ, И СЕГОДНЯШНЯЯ ПЕРЕДАЧА ПОСВЯЩЕНА — ЭНЕРГОПОТРЕБЛЕНИЮ
ENG: My name is Seth, and today's Public Service Announcement is dedicated to — Energy Consumption!

Standard: THIS PROGRAM IS BROUGHT TO YOU BY THE SALVATION PROJECT.
RU: ГЛАВНЫЙ СПОНСОР НАШЕЙ ПРОГРАММЫ - ПРОЖЕКТ ИСКУПЛЕНИЯ
ENG: THIS PROGRAM IS BROUGHT TO YOU BY THE SALVATION PROJECT.

Standard: So, as we previously stated, energy consumption is an extremely important issue!
RU: Как говорилось ранее, энергопотребление является крайне серьезной проблемой!
ENG: So, as we previously stated, energy consumption is an extremely important issue!

Standard: However, sometimes, we have to ignore it, to protect ourselves from the evils of the world!
RU: Однако, иногда нам приходится игнорировать ее, чтобы спастись от сатанинской угрозы!
ENG: However, sometimes, we have to ignore it, to protect ourselves from the evils of the world!

Standard: As you all know, satanism has started to rapidly grow in our communities!
RU: Как вы уже знаете, сатанизм стремительно набирает популярность в нашей стране, и наши граждане начали борьбу!
ENG: As you all know, satanism has started to rapidly grow in our communities!

Standard: Since our last program, many of our viewers relayed to us their successes of protecting their house from the devil's propaganda!
RU: С прошлого эфира многие наши зрители сообщили о своих успехах в борьбе с пропагандой дьявольщины!
ENG: Since our last program, many of our viewers relayed to us their successes of protecting their house from the devil's propaganda!

Standard: But that is not enough!
RU: Но и этого не достаточно! Как говорится в Иеремии, гл. 29, стих 11: Ведь Я знаю Мои намерения о вас, — возвещает Господь.
ENG: But that is not enough!

Standard: As Jeremiah 29:11 says: For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord, plans for welfare and not for evil, to give you a future and a hope.
RU: Намерения принести вам благополучие, а не беду, даровать вам будущее и надежду!
ENG: As Jeremiah 29:11 says: For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord, plans for welfare and not for evil, to give you a future and a hope.

Standard: The Devil comes at the devil's hour! But using science, our specialists discovered that the correct time of the devil's hour is 8 p.m. !
RU: Дьявол придёт в тёмный час! Но используя современную науку, наши учёные выяснили, что “тёмный час” - это 8 вечера!
ENG: The Devil comes at the devil's hour! But using science, our specialists discovered that the correct time of the devil's hour is 8 p.m. !

Standard: The Devil fears The Light! Even the smallest darkness can bring the devil, so we shall shine the light on it, and bring safety to our homes!
RU: Дьявол боится Света! Даже слабая тень может впустить Дьявола в ваш дом! Поэтому вы должны пролить свет на тьму и обезопасить себя.
ENG: The Devil fears The Light! Even the smallest darkness can bring the devil, so we shall shine the light on it, and bring safety to our homes!

Standard: We implore you - turn on every light in the home until 8 p.m., and make your house safer! The Devil shall not pass!
RU: Вот наш совет - сохраните свой дом, включите все светильники в здании до восьми вечера! Дьявол не пройдет!
ENG: We implore you - turn on every light in the home until 8 p.m., and make your house safer! The Devil shall not pass!

Standard: Be careful, because if you don't care, THEY WILL.
RU: Берегите себя и своих близких, иначе будет нечего беречь!
ENG: Be careful, because if you don't care, THEY WILL.

Standard: This was a Salvation Project program, until the next time!\nSeth out!
RU: Это был эфир Прожекта Искупления, с вами был Сет.\nДо скорой встречи!
ENG: This was a Salvation Project program, until the next time!\nSeth out!

Standard: Window is already closed.
ENG: Window is already closed.

Standard: I have to get the instruments and materials from the garage!
RU: Мне нужно забрать инструменты и доски из гаража!
ENG: I have to get the instruments and materials from the garage!

Standard: One more window down!
RU: Это окно готово!
ENG: One more window down!

Standard: That's it for windows!
RU: С окнами покончено!
ENG: That's it for windows!

Standard: {$count} more to go!
RU: Осталось еще {$count}!
ENG: {$count} more to go!

Standard: I think that's it! Now the house is impenetrable to demons!
RU: Вроде бы всё! Теперь демоны внутрь не залезут!
ENG: I think that's it! Now the house is impenetrable to demons!

Standard: I think...
RU: Надеюсь...
ENG: I think...

Standard: I should go and see Seth.
RU: Пожалуй, надо проведать Сета.
ENG: I should go and see Seth.

Standard: These planks should be enough to cover all the windows in the house!.
RU: Этих досок должно хватить, чтобы заколотить все окна!
ENG: These planks should be enough to cover all the windows in the house!.

Standard: This hammer should do just fine! The nails are just the size i need too.
RU: Этот молоток подойдёт! И гвозди как раз то, что надо!
ENG: This hammer should do just fine! The nails are just the size i need too.

Standard: These are all the materials I'll need.
RU: Это всё, что мне нужно.
ENG: These are all the materials I'll need.

Standard: I have to find all the windows!
RU: Я должна найти все окна!
ENG: I have to find all the windows!

Standard: Now I need to find a hammer and some nails.
RU: Теперь мне нужно найти молоток с гвоздями.
ENG: Now I need to find a hammer and some nails.

Standard: They must be around somewhere.
RU: Они должны быть где-то рядом.
ENG: They must be around somewhere.

Standard: Now I need to find the planks.
RU: Теперь нужно найти доски.
ENG: Now I need to find the planks.

Standard: They must be around here somewhere.
RU: Они должны быть где-то рядом.
ENG: They must be around here somewhere.

Standard: Oh my God! It was turned, just like he said!
RU: Боже мой! Распятие перевернуто, как он и сказал!
ENG: Oh my God! It was turned, just like he said!

Standard: I should fix it immediately!
RU: Я должна это немедленно исправить.
ENG: I should fix it immediately!

Standard: That's better!
RU: Так-то лучше!
ENG: That's better!

Standard: I need to find one more rotated cross!
RU: Мне нужно найти где еще есть перевернутые распятия!
ENG: I need to find one more rotated cross!

Standard: It was the last one!
RU: Это было последним!
ENG: It was the last one!

Standard: Cross is rotated back already.
RU: Распятие уже перевернуто.
ENG: Cross is rotated back already.

Standard: I see you have completed your mission!
RU: Я смотрю, миссия выполнена!
ENG: I see you have completed your mission!

Standard: And most importantly, you are still alive!
RU: А самое главное, вы все еще живы!
ENG: And most importantly, you are still alive!

Standard: Karen: I was attacked! How can you be so insensitive?
RU: Да на меня напали! Почему ты такой равнодушный?
ENG: Karen: I was attacked! How can you be so insensitive?

Standard: Seth: I AM NOT INSENSITIVE, I AM JUST DOING MY JOB! AND MY JOB IS TO KEEP YOU SAFE!
RU: Сет: Я НЕ РАВНОДУШНЫЙ, Я ВСЕГО ЛИШЬ ДЕЛАЮ СВОЮ РАБОТУ! А МОЯ РАБОТА - УБЕРЕЧЬ ТЕБЯ!
ENG: Seth: I AM NOT INSENSITIVE, I AM JUST DOING MY JOB! AND MY JOB IS TO KEEP YOU SAFE!

Standard: MISSUS, YOU SHOULD NOT ANGER THE ONE, WHO GIVES YOU SALVATION!
RU: МИСС, ВЫ НЕ ДОЛЖНЫ ЗЛИТЬ ТОГО, КТО ДАРУЕТ ВАМ ИСКУПЛЕНИЕ!
ENG: MISSUS, YOU SHOULD NOT ANGER THE ONE, WHO GIVES YOU SALVATION!

Standard: You look tired. You should go to sleep.
RU: Вы выглядите устало. Ложитесь спать.
ENG: You look tired. You should go to sleep.

Standard: Karen: But I don't want to sleep! I need to understand!
RU: Карен: Но я не хочу спать! Я должна понять!
ENG: Karen: But I don't want to sleep! I need to understand!

Standard: Seth: Go. To. Sleep.
RU: Сет: Ложитесь. Спать.
ENG: Seth: Go. To. Sleep.

Standard: Maybe check your garage for instruments and materials, you are bound to have something!
RU: Поищи инструменты и доски в гараже, уж там-то точно что-нибудь найдёшь!
ENG: Maybe check your garage for instruments and materials, you are bound to have something!

Standard: I also remember you having a cross in here nearby, as well as a mirror in your room.
RU: Я видел пару распятий у тебя в доме, а ещё большое зеркало в твоей комнате.
ENG: I also remember you having a cross in here nearby, as well as a mirror in your room.

Standard: So, what are you waiting for? Go go go!!
RU: Ну, чего стоишь? Вперёд, вперёд, вперёд!!
ENG: So, what are you waiting for? Go go go!!

Standard: What a charmer huh? Sure is an energetic fella!
RU: Ну и обаяшка! Какой энергичный парень!
ENG: What a charmer huh? Sure is an energetic fella!

Standard: But he is right! You should get on your feet, and start covering them windows!
RU: Но он прав! Пора проснуться и начать баррикадировать окна!
ENG: But he is right! You should get on your feet, and start covering them windows!

Standard: What was that thing?
RU: Что это было?
ENG: What was that thing?

Standard: It's not here...?
RU: Оно не здесь...?
ENG: It's not here...?

Standard: I need to cover this!
RU: Надо завесить это зеркало!
ENG: I need to cover this!

Standard: Mirror is covered already.
RU: Зеркало уже завешено.
ENG: Mirror is covered already.

Standard: WELCOME, EVERYONE!
RU: ПРИВЕТ ВСЕМ!
ENG: WELCOME, EVERYONE!

Standard: MY NAME IS SETH,  AND TODAY'S PUBLIC SERVICE ANNOUNCEMENT IS DEDICATED TO THE SIGNS OF SATAN IN YOUR HOUSE!
RU: МЕНЯ ЗОВУТ СЕТ, И СЕГОДНЯШНЯЯ ПЕРЕДАЧА ПОСВЯЩЕНА ПРИЗНАКАМ ДЬЯВОЛА В ВАШЕМ ДОМЕ!
ENG: MY NAME IS SETH,  AND TODAY'S PUBLIC SERVICE ANNOUNCEMENT IS DEDICATED TO THE SIGNS OF SATAN IN YOUR HOUSE!

Standard: This program is brought to you by The Salvation Project.
RU: ГЛАВНЫЙ СПОНСОР НАШЕЙ ПРОГРАММЫ - ПРОЖЕКТ ИСКУПЛЕНИЯ!
ENG: This program is brought to you by The Salvation Project.

Standard: As you should know, THE DEVIL IS COMING! And we should all be protecting ourselves and our loved ones from the Devil!
RU: Как вам наверняка известно, ДЬЯВОЛ ГРЯДЁТ! Нам же надо сделать все возможное, чтобы защитить от него себя и своих близких.
ENG: As you should know, THE DEVIL IS COMING! And we should all be protecting ourselves and our loved ones from the Devil!

Standard: CHECK YOUR WINDOWS! CHECK YOUR WINDOWS!  BOARD THEM UP! BOARD THEM UP!
RU: ПРОВЕРЬТЕ ОКНА! ПРОВЕРЬТЕ ОКНА! ПРОВЕРЬТЕ ОКНА! ЗАКОЛОТИТЕ ИХ! ЗАКОЛОТИТЕ ИХ!
ENG: CHECK YOUR WINDOWS! CHECK YOUR WINDOWS!  BOARD THEM UP! BOARD THEM UP!

Standard: SATAN SHALL NOT PASS!
RU: ДЬЯВОЛ НЕ ПРОЙДЕТ!
ENG: SATAN SHALL NOT PASS!

Standard: CHECK YOUR CROSSES! MAKE SURE THEY ARE NOT INVERTED! CHECK YOUR MIRRORS! COVER THEM UP!
RU: ПРОВЕРЬТЕ ВАШИ РАСПЯТЬЯ! УБЕДИТЕСЬ ЧТО ОНИ НЕ ПЕРЕВЕРНУТЫ! ПРОВЕРЬТЕ ЗЕРКАЛА! ЗАВЕСЬТЕ ИХ!
ENG: CHECK YOUR CROSSES! MAKE SURE THEY ARE NOT INVERTED! CHECK YOUR MIRRORS! COVER THEM UP!

Standard: SATANNNNN SHALL NOT PASS! SATANNNNN SHALL NOT PASS!
RU: ДЬЯВОЛ НЕ ПРОЙДЕТ! ДЬЯВОЛ НЕ ПРОЙДЕТ!
ENG: SATANNNNN SHALL NOT PASS! SATANNNNN SHALL NOT PASS!

Standard: Be careful, because if you don't care, THEY WILL.
RU: Берегите себя и своих близких, иначе беречь будет некого!
ENG: Be careful, because if you don't care, THEY WILL.

Standard: This was a Salvation Project program, until next time!\nSeth out!
RU: Это был эфир Прожекта Искупления, с вами был Сет!\nДо скорой встречи!
ENG: This was a Salvation Project program, until next time!\nSeth out!

Standard: The lights are not coming on! I need to do what Seth says quickly!
RU: Свет не включается! Да и всё равно!
ENG: The lights are not coming on! I need to do what Seth says quickly!

Standard: I need to find candles and chalk in the storage! Nothing else matters now!
RU: Нужно найти свечи и зажигалку, как сказал Сет!
ENG: I need to find candles and chalk in the storage! Nothing else matters now!

Standard: YESSS!! YEHEHEHESSS!! NOW THE TIME HAS COME, YOUR SOUL WILL BE OURS!
RU: ДААА! ДА-ХА-ХА-ХА! ВРЕМЯ ПРИШЛО! ТВОЯ ДУША БУДЕТ НАШЕЙ!
ENG: YESSS!! YEHEHEHESSS!! NOW THE TIME HAS COME, YOUR SOUL WILL BE OURS!

Standard: THE SALVATION PROJECT! IT IS FINALLY COMPLETED!\nTHE HOLLOW STAR  HAS AWAKENED AND YOU WERE IT'S ORIGINATOR!
RU: ПРОЖЕКТ ИСКУПЛЕНИЯ: ОН НАКОНЕЦ ЗАВЕРШЁН! ОТРЕЧЁННАЯ ЗВЕЗДА ПРОБУДИЛАСЬ! И ВСЁ ЭТО БЛАГОДАРЯ ТЕБЕ!
ENG: THE SALVATION PROJECT! IT IS FINALLY COMPLETED!\nTHE HOLLOW STAR  HAS AWAKENED AND YOU WERE IT'S ORIGINATOR!

Standard: PERISH YOU NAIVE WENCH, AND SUCCUMB TO THE WILL OF OUR DARK LORD!
RU: СДОХНИ, НАИВНАЯ ЖЕНЩИНА, И СДАЙСЯ ВОЛЕ НАШЕГО ТЕМНОГО ВЛАСТЕЛИНА!
ENG: PERISH YOU NAIVE WENCH, AND SUCCUMB TO THE WILL OF OUR DARK LORD!

Standard: I need to find all materials in a storage!
RU: Я должна найти все материалы в кладовке!
ENG: I need to find all materials in a storage!

Standard: I need to talk to Seth first.
RU: Мне нужно сначала поговорить с Сетом.
ENG: I need to talk to Seth first.

Standard: THATS' IT!\nNow, draw the sacred pentagram, and place the candles on the edges of the forsaken star!
RU: ЭТО ВСЁ, ЧТО НУЖНО!\nТеперь нарисуй священную пентаграмму и расставь свечи по углам отреченной звезды!
ENG: THATS' IT!\nNow, draw the sacred pentagram, and place the candles on the edges of the forsaken star!

Standard: The Lord Demands it! The Lord is Coming!
RU: ГОСПОДЬ ТОГО ТРЕБУЕТ! ГОСПОДЬ ИДЕТ!
ENG: The Lord Demands it! The Lord is Coming!

Standard: Focus now!
RU: Слушай внимательно!
ENG: Focus now!

Standard: Get the chalk and candles from storage, lighter from the kitchen, and DON'T forget the lighter!
RU: Найди мел и свечи в кладовке, зажигалку на кухне и НЕ СМЕЙ что-нибудь забыть!
ENG: Get the chalk and candles from storage, lighter from the kitchen, and DON'T forget the lighter!

Standard: The storage room is right across the corridor!
RU: Кладовка - прямо по коридору!
ENG: The storage room is right across the corridor!

Standard: Then, and ONLY then get back to me, and we'll begin the ritual.
RU: Тогда и ТОЛЬКО ТОГДА возвращайся ко мне, и мы начнем ритуал.
ENG: Then, and ONLY then get back to me, and we'll begin the ritual.

Standard: HEYA THERE MISSUS!
RU: Ну здравствуйте, мисс!
ENG: HEYA THERE MISSUS!

Standard: I SEE YOU'RE BACK AGAIN FOR THE DAILY WISDOM!
RU: Я ВИЖУ, ТЫ ВЕРНУЛАСЬ ЗА ЕЖЕДНЕВНОЙ ПОРЦИЕЙ МУДРОСТИ!
ENG: I SEE YOU'RE BACK AGAIN FOR THE DAILY WISDOM!

Standard: YOU ARE UNDER ATTACK!
RU: ТЫ ПОД УГРОЗОЙ!
ENG: YOU ARE UNDER ATTACK!

Standard: YOUR LIFE IS UNDER ATTACK!
RU: ТВОЯ ЖИЗНЬ ПОД УГРОЗОЙ!
ENG: YOUR LIFE IS UNDER ATTACK!

Standard: YOUR SOUL IS UNDER ATTACK!
RU: ТВОЯ ДУША ПОД УГРОЗОЙ!
ENG: YOUR SOUL IS UNDER ATTACK!

Standard: WE HAVE TO GO FOR THE NUCLEAR OPTION - YOU HAVE TO CALL FOR HELP!
RU: НАМ ПРИДЕТСЯ ПРИБЕГНУТЬ К КРАЙНИМ МЕРАМ! МЫ ОБРАТИМСЯ ЗА ПОМОЩЬЮ!
ENG: WE HAVE TO GO FOR THE NUCLEAR OPTION - YOU HAVE TO CALL FOR HELP!

Standard: LUCKILY, OUR MANAGER KNOWS THE CORRECT RITUAL, TO SUMMON A GUARDIAN ANGEL FOR YOUR HOME!
RU: К СЧАСТЬЮ, НАШ МЕНЕДЖЕР ЗНАЕТ ПОДХОДЯЩИЙ РИТУАЛ, ПРИЗЫВАЮЩИЙ АНГЕЛА ХРАНИТЕЛЯ В ТВОЙ ДОМ!
ENG: LUCKILY, OUR MANAGER KNOWS THE CORRECT RITUAL, TO SUMMON A GUARDIAN ANGEL FOR YOUR HOME!

Standard: DO IT! NOW! DO IT! NOW!
RU: СДЕЛАЙ ЭТО! СДЕЛАЙ ЭТО! СДЕЛАЙ ЭТО!
ENG: DO IT! NOW! DO IT! NOW!

Standard: Karen: What was that? What is happening?
ENG: Karen: What was that? What is happening?

Standard: Everything is back to normal...
ENG: Everything is back to normal...

Standard: I should go and pick up that phone.
ENG: I should go and pick up that phone.

Standard: What are these wailings? What is happening? What am I....
RU: Что это за крики? Что за стоны? Что тут.....
ENG: What are these wailings? What is happening? What am I....

Standard: Man on the phone: Ma'am? Hello ma'am, can you hear me?
RU: Мужчина в телефоне: Мэм, вы меня слышите?
ENG: Man on the phone: Ma'am? Hello ma'am, can you hear me?

Standard: You stopped responding to my calls a week ago, is everything okay?
RU: Вы перестали отвечать на звонки с прошлой недели.
ENG: You stopped responding to my calls a week ago, is everything okay?

Standard: Do you take your medication daily?
RU: Вы не забываете принимать свои таблетки?
ENG: Do you take your medication daily?

Standard: Karen: I need help....
RU: Карен: Мне нужна помощь....
ENG: Karen: I need help....

Standard: I want to see my family again.
RU: Я хочу увидеть свою семью...
ENG: I want to see my family again.

Standard: I should go down to the garage and restart the power.
RU: Я должна спуститься в гараж и включить свет.
ENG: I should go down to the garage and restart the power.

Standard: Karen: Oh no! I think the power went out because of the overload!
RU: Карен: О нет! Кажется, пробки выбило из-за нагрузки!
ENG: Karen: Oh no! I think the power went out because of the overload!

Standard: I should go down to the garage and restart the power.
RU: Я должна спуститься в гараж и включить свет.
ENG: I should go down to the garage and restart the power.

Standard: Karen: Oh no! I think the power went out because of the overload!
RU: Карен: О нет! Кажется, пробки выбило из-за нагрузки!
ENG: Karen: Oh no! I think the power went out because of the overload!

Standard: I should go down to the garage and restart the power.
RU: Я должна спуститься в гараж и включить свет.
ENG: I should go down to the garage and restart the power.

Standard: Karen: Oh no! I think the power went out because of the overload!
RU: Карен: О нет! Кажется, пробки выбило из-за нагрузки!
ENG: Karen: Oh no! I think the power went out because of the overload!

Standard: I think that's it! Now the house is inpenetrable to demons!
RU: Вроде бы всё! Теперь демоны внутрь не залезут!
ENG: I think that's it! Now the house is inpenetrable to demons!

Standard: I think...
RU: Надеюсь...
ENG: I think...

Standard: I should go and see Seth.
RU: Пожалуй, надо проведать Сета.
ENG: I should go and see Seth.
